scripts.dev:kill-ports: lsof -ti:5173 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev:open: node --input-type=module -e "import{exec}from'child_process';import{get}from'http';const c=p=>new Promise(r=>{get('http://localhost:'+p,()=>r(1)).on('error',()=>r(0)).setTimeout(99)});(async()=>{for(let i=0;i<60;i++){if(await c(5173)&&await c(8000)){console.log('âœ… Servers ready! Opening browser...');exec('open http://localhost:8000');process.exit(0)}await new Promise(r=>setTimeout(r,500))}process.exit(1)})()"
scripts.dev: pnpm dev:kill-ports && concurrently -n vite,django -c "blue.bold,green.bold" "pnpm --filter fpbase dev" "PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 uv run backend/manage.py runserver"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && pnpm -r exec -- rm -rf node_modules && pnpm -r run clean
